headline: Hasbro (HAS) Valuation in Focus as Dungeons & Dragons Digital Expansion Gains Traction
summary: Hasbro (HAS) is making strategic moves by expanding its digital gaming footprint, most notably through Wizards of the Coast’s new Montréal video game studio focused on fresh Dungeons & Dragons digital projects. This latest development demonstrates that the company is embracing growth opportunities across both digital and collectible platforms. See our latest analysis for Hasbro. Alongside Hasbro’s push into digital gaming with new Dungeons & Dragons projects, the company has been busy...
